00063   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListUsersOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest) {
00064 
00065 
00066   if(!userServer.isAdmin()) {
00067     UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00068     throw e;
00069   }
00070   std::string  userId = options->getUserId();
00071   if(userId.size()!=0) {
00072     //To check if the user id is correct
00073     checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00074     addOptionRequest("userid", userId, sqlRequest);
00075   }
00076 
00077   std::string  authSystemId = options->getAuthSystemId();
00078   if(authSystemId.size()!=0) {
00079     //To check if the authSystem identifier is correct
00080     checkAuthSystemId(authSystemId);
00081     //addOptionRequest("authsystemid", authSystemId, sqlRequest);
00082     sqlRequest.append(" and userid IN (SELECT userid from authsystem, users,"
00083                             "authaccount where authsystemid='"+authSystemId+"'"
00084                             "and authaccount.authsystem_authsystemid=authsystem.numauthsystemid and authaccount.users_numuserid=users.numuserid)"
00085                             );
00086   }
00087 
00088   }

00096   UMS_Data::ListUsers* list() {
00097 
00098   std::string sqlListofUsers = "SELECT userid, pwd, firstname, lastname, privilege, email, status from users "
00099                               "where not userid='"+ ROOTUSERNAME +"'";
00100 
00101   std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00102   std::vector<std::string> results;
00103   UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00104   mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListUsers();
00105 
00106   //Creation of the object user
00107   UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);
00108   userServer.init();

00110   if (userServer.exist()) {
00111 
00112     processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListofUsers);
00113     sqlListofUsers.append(" order by userid");
00114     //To get the list of users from the database
00115     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> ListofUsers (mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListofUsers.c_str()));
00116     if (ListofUsers->getNbTuples() != 0){
00117       for (size_t i = 0; i < ListofUsers->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00118         results.clear();
00119         results = ListofUsers->get(i);
00120         ii = results.begin();
00121         UMS_Data::User_ptr user = ecoreFactory->createUser();
00122         user->setUserId(*ii);
00123         user->setPassword(*(++ii));
00124         user->setFirstname(*(++ii));
00125         user->setLastname(*(++ii));
00126         user->setPrivilege(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00127         user->setEmail(*(++ii));
00128         user->setStatus(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00129 
00130         mlistObject->getUsers().push_back(user);
00131         }
00132     }
00133   }
00134   else {
00135     UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USER);
00136     throw e;
00137   }
00138   return mlistObject;
